channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WordPress project source code download
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WordPress project source code download

item.title: CVE-2022-1585|2024-08-03T00:10:03.753Z -- unknown -- wordpress%20project%20source%20code%20download
item.description: The Project Source Code Download WordPress plugin through 1.0.0 does not protect its backup generation and download functionalities, which may allow any visitors on the site to download the entire site, including sensitive files like wp-config.php.
